download.title: Download Decentraland
download.description: Download Decentraland and start exploring the metaverse

mobile.switch_to_computer: Switch to your computer to download Decentraland

success.title: Download Started!
success.subtitle: Open the file you just downloaded to finish installing Decentraland and start {action}
success.footer: Trouble with the download? Let's try that again: {link}
success.event: After the download is complete, go back to the {event} event page so you can jump in. Redirecting in {seconds} seconds.

step1.title: Open the file
step1.text: Find the Setup.exe file in your downloads folder and double-click it to start the installation

step2.title: Follow the installer
step2.text: The Decentraland installer will guide you through the process. Just click Next and follow the prompts

step3.title: Launch Decentraland
step3.text: Once installed, open Decentraland from your desktop or start menu and Jump In!

step1.title: Open the file
step1.text: Find the Decentraland.dmg file in your downloads and double-click to open it

step2.title: Drag to Applications
step2.text: Drag the Decentraland icon to your Applications folder to install it

step3.title: Launch Decentraland
step3.text: Open Decentraland from your Applications folder and Jump In!
